Introduction

Park Soo Hyun, known professionally as Adora (stylized as ADORA), is a South Korean singer and songwriter signed with AURA Entertainment. She initially gained recognition as a producer under Big Hit Music and was previously a trainee with Music K Entertainment. Adora was originally set to debut with the girl group The Ark but did not debut for unspecified reasons. She made her solo debut on November 5, 2021.
